meanings.definition: An advertisement in the form of editorial content.
meanings.sent1: The advertorial in the magazine looked like a regular article but was actually promoting a product.
meanings.sent2: I read an interesting advertorial in the newspaper about a new skincare product.
meanings.sent3: The advertorial about the latest tech gadget made me chuckle as it tried to blend in with the news.
meanings.sent4: Her speech was like an advertorial, smoothly promoting her ideas to the audience.
meanings.sent5: The advertorial on the website was so convincing that I almost mistook it for a genuine article.

meanings.definition: A promotional article in a newspaper or magazine.
meanings.sent1: The magazine included an advertorial for a popular vacation destination.
meanings.sent2: I always enjoy reading advertorials in newspapers to learn about new products.
meanings.sent3: The advertorial for the upcoming movie was so exaggerated that it made me laugh.
meanings.sent4: His speech at the event felt like an advertorial, promoting his achievements.
meanings.sent5: The advertorial in the magazine was so well-written that it caught my attention immediately.
